description:
Historical aerosol-only simulations resemble the histALL simulations but instead are forced by changes in aerosol forcing only. 
For models without interactive chemistry in which changes in GHG concentrations do not affect aerosols and changes in aersol precursors do not affect ozone. 
Report what sets of emissions and boundary conditions are used.
keywords: DAMIP, Tier 1, histAER, cmip6historical, aerosol forcing,  anthropogenic
rationale: Together with histNAT and histALL simulations, these simulations will allow the attribution of observed climate changes to contributions from natural forcings, aerosols and "GHG+ozone+land use change".
